content.detailedDescription: I viewed 8-12 red orange orbs in the sky.  they were not in formation and seemed to be following a separate path.  they appeared over the treeline near the big chicken in marietta, ga in alost a semi circle but they all moved from the original line and moved in a slow speed.  they almost seemed to be moving like a bobber on the water as they moved along.  within a couple minutes they faded out. they must have been close because they started at about 45 degrees from the horizon.  i was able to get directly under the last one before it faded away.  multiple other people saw the same lights and were startled.
content.summary: 8-12 orange orbs moving in a slow path but each moved in a slightly different path.  each seemed to almost bob at times.  several others saw them.  they faded out one at a time.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard just looking up at the stars. at approximately 10:20pm edt, i noticed what appeared to be a star that suddenly started moving. it was off to the south moving in a northerly direction. it was at least as bright as the brightest stars visible but as it progressed almost directly over me, it began to dim. after observing it for about a minute, it faded and i lost sight of it. i suspect it may have only been a satellite but, as i said, when i first spotted it, it appeared stationary. then again, that could've just been my eyes playing a trick on me. all things considered, i figured i'd report it just in case. i'm sure nasa or someone could tell you if there was a satellite passing over connecticut at the time. if it wasn't a satellite.....Oh, boy.
content.summary: I observed a light in the sky. at first it appeared stationary and then began to move about due north.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard when i noticed from east on the horizon a light like a star tumbling i immediately noticed there were numerous lights and it looked odd. it displayed strange movements so i started to record with my cell phone. i took a one minute video but could get closer shots with my camera rather than video. the colorful object split like an explosion and a glowing light manifested and pulsed over my head. it had gotten closer and stabilized with the fireball breathing and spinning. the lower object span wild like a top but was doing some kind of moving like something was growing and living below the portal. i followed for an hour in my robe from 10:59 til nearly 1:00 am and took a lot of photos and 2 good videos of an actual pulsing light and transforming craft and also a video of a light tumbling through the stratosphere then spinning back across the video the other way in every color known to man. i finally chased in my car when it dips higher back away from the trees and then ascended higher until finally at the top of the sky straight up. i took my phone and checked and saw that although my phone was low on battery i was able to get such good pictures at the distance it was from me
content.summary: Orb style ufo spins wildly from east horizon into the south i immediately noticed colors then a split and fireball before ascension

content.detailedDescription: This will be considered the most perplexing ufo i have ever witnessed. i was in eaton rapids, looking east during twilight, although the sky was nearly black. you could tell there were no clouds. initially, i thought to myself, this must be a planet, because it seemed in appearance exactly like venus, in terms of brightness. i didn't see any movement of the object. the color was white. i looked away for about three seconds, after which the object was gone. initially, i thought that if this was not a planet, then this had to be an iridium flare. however, if this was the case, then i assume it would not fade out so quickly. it seems as though it seemed to disappear more than fade out. i assume that this could be a reflection, not sure if a plane would qualify because it made no sound. my best guess would be a tumbling satellite. before this event, i have witnessed multiple of these anomalies, and they were exactly like this ufo, except far darker. the elevation was about 10 to 13 degrees, exactly east, maybe shifted slightly to the south, by no more than five degrees. i have not checked the satellite data for that place and time yet.
content.summary: At 10:15 pm, a starry object, thought to be a star, seemed to vanish into the clear sky within 5 seconds

content.detailedDescription: Was heading out on my boat and was taking a pic of the sunrise over the bay and saw it through my phone camera
content.summary: Saw while taking pictures of sunrise

content.detailedDescription:
6-28-2016  9:15 pm. campbell, ca.
  i was watching tv and suddenly my fiancé called me outside with a panicky tone to her voice.
  there was at least 20 multi colored lights zig-zagging across the sky moving from the west to the east. changing directions from up and down to left to right at a high rate of speed. along with my fiancé i was stunned. it seemed that there was some sort of intelligence guiding these objects.
  my future brother-in-law came outside with some binoculars and claimed that the objects were too far up to get a better, clear view.
  as the three of us stood there stunned at what we were witnessing, i noticed further up in the night sky the was three huge circular objects traveling at a slower rate of speed. it appeared that there was some sort of cloaking device covering up them. i observed a lighter colored circular objects against the night sky moving from west to east in a straight line.
  i haven't had a solid night of sleep since this has happened. the quick, flashing lights and the huge circular objects have left me with one question. what does this all mean?
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Quick colored lights / huge circular objects that are cloaked

content.detailedDescription:
O n saturday august 4th, 1962 my aunt, grandmother, sister, mother, and i were returning to chicago after visiting rhe wisconsin state fair. we were going south on 45 through hale's corners. i was hanging my head out of the window watching the saucer. it was dome shaped and had lights running around the ship under the dome. they were sequential with 2 white, one red, 2 white, one red, etc.My aunt was hollering at me to get my head back in the carand i said i was watching a flying saucer. then my mother turned around and was watching out the back window, my sister was hanging her head out thr other window. it made a soft humming sound and the lights went slowly round and round as it followed the car. it must have been around 30 minutes when i said to my aunt to pull over so she and my grandmother could see. she pulled over but by the time we got out of the car it was gone.

i want this to on record because my aunt, grandmother and mother have passed away and there is only mr and my sister to tell the story.
content.summary: Craft followed our car. was seen by me, mother and sister

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on a beach in hawaii at about 10 o'clock at night, just looking up at the beautiful night sky as i do often, it was a clear night, not a cloud in the sky, at about 70 degrees in the horizon over the ocean i saw a green flashing light moving in the sky, i watched it for a few minutes just assuming it was an airplane, but when it started to change direction abruptly i started to film it, i started to become more and more shocked at what i was seeing, it was a green flashing light, not like any green i've ever seen on any airplane, it was moving in a western direction, then it started to move back to the east, again, these were very abrupt movements in the sky, as you watch the video it appears as if i'm moving the camera, but i am not, it is the object that is moving around so radically, as the object was heading east it all of a sudden switch to a red flashing light only it was flashing faster than the green was, again, this object was jetting around in the sky like nothing i've ever seen before!! the object then disappeared into the eastern sky.
content.summary: Unexplained light in the night sky changing color and direction very abruptly

content.detailedDescription:
I had set clock to go off in 2 hours so i could take a nap before getting ready for work. i laid down when i heard my neighbors talking outside. they were pointing and looking at a disk hovering over the street light. i looked at it and i remember thinking, "this can't be real", i turned my head and laid it back down, i heard someone say the police said it must be a weather balloon. i looked out at it again, which was a few seconds later, i seen a really bright light shine at me and the net thing i remember was lying there in the bed. a minute or two later, i look at the clock and it was three hours later. i was going to be late for work. i also noticed i had a small soar behind my left ear which i attributed to an injury from laying on my earring at some other time since i didn't have any on at the time. this event has troubled me for years and i have never been able to account for that missing time.
prior to this, around the fourth of july, i do not remember the exact year, i remember i had been suffering from terrible headaches. my father took me to the doctor. the doctor ordered and ct scan to see what was going on. he informed me that i had a collection of metal debris really close to my sinus cavity and he gave me medication that he said would dissolve it. years later, i felt like something was in my nose. i kept rubbing it and finally, what looked like a wadded up piece if foil in blood came out of my nose.
since then, at night right before i sleep, i sometimes get this engine humming noise, like it is swirling around somewhere close, it scares me something awful, the next thing i remember, its day light and i know i have not been to sleep because i am so very tired. 
even now, i wake up with bruises and pains i have no recollection of how or why they are there. i have only spoke about these things to one other person in my entire life. i have always been afraid of what others would think about me if i told them. i have often wondered myself.
content.summary: Silver/grey small disk hovering over street light sent light beam through bedroom window and the net thing i remembered, it was two hours later.

content.detailedDescription: As i was hiking the lands, i have seen an ufo next to the electrosmog-tower, which is there to activete chemtrails. i see ufos there, sometimes! please help me!
content.summary: An ufo was flying across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out on my patio before going to bed and looked up at the sky to see if i could see the stars/milky way (as i do almost every night in summer).  it was mostly overcast.  my patio is on the south side of my house and as i looked toward the foothills to my left (southeast) i caught a light out of the corner of my eye up in the clouds, streaking across the sky.  when i turned to look directly at it, i saw quite a few more all moving in the same direction. i was baffled. my first thought was that it was car headlights in the distance bouncing off the clouds.  then as i continued to watch, i realized the lights were not bouncing off the bottom of the cloud cover but were in it-and appeared to be going in a large circle. as i continued to watch, i could occasionally glimpse the lights moving in the opposite direction as they went around the back side-which confirmed the circular motion.  i was home alone and got a bit freaked so i came inside, shut off the light and watched through the bedroom window.  i noticed my stomach was knotted-still is.  this continued for about 20 minutes-white lights going clockwise.  initially there were multiple lights in quick succession but as i continued to watch, there were just two close together (for a couple minutes)- then it was just one light going around.  the circle it transcribed was huge and it remained stationary the entire time.  i finally walked over to my bed, sat down and got on my laptop to see if i could find any other reports of this.  i pulled up a reporting site and filed it there. after filing, there was a notice the site was down with technical issues.  i also noticed others stating they reported their sightings here so i decided to do the same.  but first i went back to the window to check the lights. as i could no longer see them, i went outside. the clouds had thinned and cleared up in most areas (though not completely in that area) but there appeared to be no longer any sign of it.
content.summary: Saw lights in clouds moving in a circle counter clockwise-lasted 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription: we were sitting at the bus station in sikeston and we witnessed what appeared to be several stars rotating around each other. that is when we noticed two  big orange spheres followed by many (too many to count) smaller ships with two jet like engines as well as several disc shaped objects that were clearly saucers when viewed with binoculars.After viewing subtle movements for several hours the objects began to move in wild seemingly impossible movements. the saucers were obviously within our atmosphere. i have been able to locate these objects for several weeks now. sometimes they will appear in great and obvious numbers, other nights we can only see a few, but we always see something. tonight in particular they was the so called mother orb and all the smaller ones would slowly follow it.
content.summary: Bright orange ob floating moving around in multi directions, also a saucer with lights blinking around center

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
1. i was coming home from work just pulled in to my house knowing i was home alone. 
i was playing music from my car and got out because i noticed how clear the sky was 

2. staring up at the stars i noticed an object hovering with triangle like lights blinking. 

3. at first i could not tell if the object was real or not but as the lights on it blinked and went in between clouds and closer to my house i became scared 

5. i began to think the ufo was coming for me and felt a crazy psychological feeling. it decended and hovered in plain sight near my house 

i had no lights on at my house at the time of pulling in 

i ran inside to get binoculars and turned on my outside lights to try to record this event with my phone somehow 

the object was gone when i returned outside. 

i was alone and scared during this incident and ran into my room.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw black triangle. lights blinked around corners of triangle. almost landed or hovered

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dogs through the park as the last of the daylight was fading away. i noticed a bright red light out of the corner of my eye and looked at a cutout between clumps of trees to the south where i noticed a very big diamond shaped object (about 50 ft tall) moving to the west and a bit south just above the tree tops. it was composed of two 4-sided pyramids, with one pointing up and one pointing down, joined in the middle. it was moving about 45 miles an hour being closely followed by a red orb object about 3 feet wide. the diamond object looked like a ruby with a bright yellow/white light inside pulsing very brightly about once every 1.5 seconds. the object was slowly spinning counter-clockwise looking from the top-down.

 the entire object looked like solid glass lit up crimson colored. the edges were well-defined and looked perfectly straight and also razor sharp points on the top and bottom. i saw that it was on a heading that would take it behind a clump of trees coming up and i knew i only had seconds to see it. i knew if i fumbled my phone out and into camera mode it would be gone by then, so reluctantly i didn't even try to get my phone out to record. i just wanted to focus on getting a very good look at it because it was moving kind of slow and perfectly steady. the diamond object was moving without any wobbles or bobbing, but the red orb was slightly wobbly but following the center of the diamond closely. after about 7 seconds it was out of sight behind the trees. i saw the object spin around completely about 2 times making it apparent that it had 4 edges around the middle making it a pair of 4-sided pyramids. i also saw that there were no lights other than light seemingly emanating from the center of it and the crimson lit surfaces, and it had no features whatsoever besides the geometry and perfectly flat sides. the object made no noise and did not leave a trail or exhaust. there were no windows but the entire object seemed uniformly semi-transparent. at the time of the sighting i had no idea what the object could be.

 the extreme pointy nature of this craft seemed strange to me because it didn't look like it could easily land anywhere. it seemed more practical to me that this was some sort of machine being guided into place. later i thought that maybe there was a reason for such an extremely pointy angle on the top and bottom. i did drawings and estimated the triangles composing the 8 faces of both pyramids making up the object to be 70, 70, 40 degree triangles. later i saw someone strangely post something about a sublime triangle which is a 72, 72, 36 degree triangle and has significant mathematical and geometric properties.

 i wasn't fearful while witnessing the object, but later i became a little nervous that maybe i saw something sensitive but there hasn't been any trouble since it happened. i've seen a lot of orbs in the last few years and a handful of other impressive uap's but nothing as well defined as the diamond. i have no idea what or who is inside these objects but i feel like it's probably et's, robots, or humans, in that order of probability. i've noticed no missing chunks of time and the times i've seen orbs and other things it always seems like they are being playfully friendly and showing off what they can do, coming closer and revealing more over time. the more i've thought about it, the more i really want to know who or what is inside them. i'm attaching a drawing i made of the diamond. thanks
content.summary: Saw large red dagger-like diamond shaped ufo being followed by red orb

content.detailedDescription: Leaving place of employment walking out to my car, noticed a cool rainbow around a sunrise over lack michigan. took a few p7cs with my cell phone. disn't notice anything other then the rainbow around the sun. drove down to the lake and took a few more picks. was reviewing the pics today ( 1 july 2016 ) and noticed a blue in color object with in the rainbow and by the sun. upon enlarging the pic, i noticed what appears to be 4 to 5 white in color lights with in the blue object. the blue object appears to be going from south to north, across the sun.
content.summary: Appeared within a rainbow that circled t h e sun

content.detailedDescription: At roughly 10:00 am i walked out to my barn to let our chickens out for the day. i walked out of the barn and looked at the sky as i was getting ready to leave for work. i noticed a very slow spinning triangular shaped object to the east. it had the same kind of reflectivity as mylar or chrome. it was only visible for about 5 seconds before disappearing into a cloud. i stood and waited for it to come out the other side but it never did. it didn't move like a cluster of balloons just a straight path into the cloud. it was so reflective i  could barely make it out against the sky but i could see 3 distinct corner.S i can't give an accurate description of size as it was too far away and at cloud height. it was moving north to south. i didn't think it was any other object but a ufo. i wish i would have had time to snap a pic but i don't think you would have been able to make it out because of how shiny it was. after a few minutes of waiting i gave up and went on with my day.
content.summary: For a few seconds i saw a chrome triangle that dissappeared into a cloud

content.detailedDescription: Last evening i was traveling on state hwy 163, which runs n/s from comstock, texas to ozona/sonora. it was completely moonless. i had stopped along the roadside, admiring the unobstructed view of the stars - west texas -rural - no ambient light = d.A.R.K. i had stopped at the base of a low hill  that raised about 200' immediately to the west... i noticed what appeared to be a fairly bright 'star'... when said object moved; very slightly, but yup that bugger moved??? a few moments later it moved again, a slight jog to the north then immediately back to original position. forgot top mention that there was a semi-steady 10-15 mph breeze, not heavy, but a breeze from the se; which is standard for this time of year... i have spent many a night on this road in years past, but only a few this year... back to story; now the object makes a much more pronounced move, again, in a straight line to the north, but much further and faster, then back, pause, and now to the left. ok; it is a drone... someone is on the top of the hill working a drone. this is a high traffic area for ins, there is a large complex in comstock... someone is operating a drone, watching traffic down on this road... i have a decently strong flashlight that i begin to shine at the 'drone', holding steady, turning on and off etc... the 'drone' now begins to make long 'verticle' slightly arcing movements. when i was younger there were little gasoline powered planes - not remote controlled mind you, but tethered and this is the motion that would best describe what i saw; tight arcs two or three, then returning to a semi stable 'base' but moving much like i would think a drone might... perhaps the operator was acknowledging my presence as i thought that at one point it did move towards my direction. at this point i decided to drive about 1-1.5 miles north. this took me to a clear view on the back side of the hill; the object was clearly not anywhere near the hill but in deed much further away, higher in the sky from this vantage, now about 60degrees and holding steady. i watched for a few moments but saw no movement, steady as a star... headed back south, stopped at same point. notice of movement, not anywhere as much as before... over the next 30-40 minutes the object held a steady path that seemed to follow the rio grande/mexico border. traveling some distance. very smooth, no wobbles as i might expect from a blimp... very slow for an air born drown - but what do i know... anyway thats my story and i'm sticking to it!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: What at first appeared as a star, noticed slight movement, then pronounced movement, then continued onward at slow steady unwaivering pace

content.detailedDescription:
1. esa tarde yo estaba en la terraza de mi casa fotografiando las montañas de mi ciudad, decidí por algunas experiencias de avistamientos que he tenido en anteriores ocasiones tomar tres fotos por cada punto registrado para descartar errores. 
por ese motivo al revisar la foto que les he enviado la comparé con las otras de respaldo donde confirmé que el objeto solo aparece en una de las tres fotografías, así pude comprender que el objeto que ahí aparece tenía movimiento y había salido de mi campo visual al tomar la segunda fotografía en un lapso de 50 segundos. 


2. no noté el objeto hasta el momento que revisé las numerosas fotografías que hice esa tarde en mi computador, revisé haciendo zoom en cada foto y noté el extraño objeto en una sola de las muchas que hice. 

3. soy biólogo profesional y pude inmediatamente descartar que se trataba de un ave, pensé que era una estructura tipo vivienda en la montaña, pero las fotos de respaldo me confirmaron que ahí no había tal objeto. 

4. no pude ver ningún tipo de movimiento al momento de disparar la fotografía, porque solo noté el objeto al revisar la imagen en mi computadora. 

5. no tuve ningún tipo de reacción al fotografiar el paisaje, pero al notar en mi análisis que había algo extraño sentí la emoción natural que siente un aficionado al tema ovni, pues siempre he experimentado avistamientos, desde que era un niño, pero jamás tuve la oportunidad de fotografiarlos, generalmente ocurrían en las noches, pude ver foo fighters volando a baja altura entrando desde el sur y saliendo al norte de mi cuidad en un rango de 3 kms de alcance en línea recta y por un tiempo de aproximadamente 30 a 40 minutos hasta perderlos de vista. 

otra inolvidable y frecuente experiencia ha sido ver “estrellas” que se mueven lentamente en el cielo, en grupos desde 2 hasta 9 estrellas, las cuales avanzaban en línea recta sin alterar su posición de manera brusca, solo siguiendo una calmada trayectoria a velocidad constante. le comenté personalmente este caso al doctor alberto quijano vodniza astrónomo vinculado a nasa quien me respondió: “usted está describiendo un evento ovni, usted no creería las fenómenos que he visto” !.
además he tenido la oportunidad de observar en un par de ocasiones objetos estacionarios como balines plateados a una altura no superior a los 2.000 metros. 

6. no pude ver cómo el objeto salía de mi campo visual al fotografiarlo. 
para comprobarlo les envío la foto que tomé antes sin el objeto (p1000108) y las dos fotografías de respaldo tomadas después de la foto principal (p 1000115 y p1000116). 
la foto principal foto 1(ovni cam) tiene el objeto hacia la posición de las 10 en punto. las otras fotografías parecen presentar dos objetos más.
content.summary: I took pictures of my city, i made several at each point, one of them the foreign object appears and the other was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
1.Estaba ensayando mi nueva cámara fotográfica de alta gama, es una panasonic lumix de alta potencia con objetivo profesional.

2. me llamó la atención que en un cielo totalmente despejado hubiera una nube solitaria, ese fue el motivo por el cual decidí disparar una foto hacia esa extraña nube. 

3.Estaba casi seguro que se trataba de una simple nube, hasta que decidí analizar esta foto con un primo que tiene conocimientos sobre el tema ovni. 

4.No hubo movimientos o acción alguna que yo haya visto, porque cuando miré y fotografié esa nube sencillamente ésta ya estaba ahí formada. 

5.No tuve reacciones inusuales ni antes ni después de fotografiar este objeto, porque pensé que solo era una nube. 

6. no supe si el objeto desapareció, porque solo tomé la foto y me retiré del lugar.
content.summary: The photograph was taken strange cloud clear sky over the city. i noticed that it was not a normal cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
It was 10:30pm on 17/5/2014. it had been a hot cloudless day and was now a cool clear night. my father had gone outside to check something in the garage and as he was coming back he saw a bright light up in the sky behind a neighbours house. he initially thought it was sirius but then realised it was the wrong time of the year. on closer observation it was brighter than sirius and was white but had a sparkling red edge to the lower side. suddenly it wobbled, which prompted him to call my mother.
she arrived to see the ball of light which had now morphed into a green colour as it glided down slowly. she in turn watched it a short time then she shouted for myself to come and see
i was watching tv and was initially reluctant to come, but hearing the urgency in her voice i grabbed my olympus sp810uz bridge camera i keep next to my tv and ran to the back door.
as i got outside my father said 'what's that?' pointing to the sky. i looked up to see a turquoise green ball of light moving away steadily until it was obscured behind the roof of a house. my initial reaction was to wonder if it was a chinese lantern, but the colour was wrong. i then raced through the house to the front of the property to try and catch sight of it again.
as i looked through a wide gap between two houses, i caught sight of the object. it immediately started flashing very rapidly through the colours red, white, green and light green and was moving in large erratic, horizontal orbits. there was no sound whatsoever.
i was so surprised by this sudden activity that i struggled to operate the camera. i initially set it recording but couldn't find the object in the viewfinder. that is when my father joined me. by now the object had morphed into a lime green colour and was moving away again. i went to record a second time but pressed the shutter in error!
for a third time i set it recording and captured it in the distance behind the treeline. it was flashing between white and red then suddenly it morphed into lime green again but with a brighter green flash at periodic intervals. we observed it moving slowly or hovering for a few seconds when suddenly it dropped fast, hovered then dropped again out of sight. it appeared so far in the distance by this time there was no point in going looking. we waited for an hour but nothing appeared again. our elderly neighbour came out to say his lights had failed but this may have been a coincidence.
due to the light conditions and lack of time, the video and still shots are out of focus but show the colour of the object very well. (i've sent this report some time after the event as i didn't have the facility to do so before, however i used notes i made at the time to compile this statement)
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ball of light morphing and flashing different colours with erratic flight characteristics

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Was about 10:30pm phoenix time. i had just finished watching a movie and it started to storm. i had been watching clips of ufo's forming in storms so that's what had glued my eyes to the skies, like i always do gazing above me to look for such things. a fireball or glowing object appeared out my 3rd floor bathroom window.  it hovered there, this was the 1st time in 40 years or 8 years in phoenix i had ever seen such a sight. i followed the ball outside in the storm. i filmed it dissapear. after that sighting a half hour later my girl & i witnessed more of the same crafts appearing then floating west.  the crafts have appeared from 6-26-16 to 7-1-16 so far only in the evenings when the sun is down.
content.summary: Fireballs emanating into crafts and floating west

content.detailedDescription: I was having a normal dream when it was interupted by a vivid dream of me on a table surrounded by aliens. there were two types. one kind that was small looked almost identical to the alien on the cover of the book communion. the other was very tall praying mantis type. the mantis type had almost clear skin with black veins that made them greyish looking. i didn't want to look right at them because i was afraid but i glanced at them often so i could remember later. i wasn't horribly scared and not sure what was being done there fingers moved to fast i couldn't keep up. i felt no pain. there was a blank space then i woke up. i drew a pic of them when i woke up. i am not sure if this was real but i have seen ufos in the past and drempt of these aliens before. i have alot of other weird stories but i really dont want to talk about them unless i have too. i am reporting this only incase someone else has seen these aliens. i will include a drawing i did.
content.summary: A normal dream was interupted by a vivid dream of laying on a table surrounded by aliens

content.detailedDescription: The sighting happened a few miles south of annapolis, md on the early morning hours of wednesday june 29th 2016.  i had taken a vacation to ocean city, md on monday the 27th of june and left to go back home tuesday night around 11pm.  i pulled over in a shopping center to text my girlfriend that i was just going thru annapolis and was halfway home.  that was at 12:54am.  i got back on the road to head south on route 2, and when i got past the town of edgewater i saw a very bright light in the sky.  i at first thought it was a planet shining brightly in the night sky, but looked more like a forward facing search light with some smaller lights around it.  i kept watching it as i drove south towards calvert county, md.  the light was very low in the sky and i kept losing it behind the tree line, but when i got closer to the light i saw two glowing balls of light come out of the bottom, drop down and fly off.  it looked like another ball of light started to drop from the craft but i started driving downhill and the trees covered the craft again.  i kept getting closer to the craft until i got directly under it.  i pulled off the road to look and it didn't make a noise and was only about 500 feet in the air.  i grabbed my cell phone to take a picture and when i did the craft took off at a high rate of speed, still making no noise at all as it went.  i turned my truck around and tried following it for a couple minutes, but it was way to fast.  from the bottom the craft looked like a triangle with a large searchlight at the front and to small lights at the corners facing down.  it looked to be about 50-75 feet across and just hovered until one tried getting a picture of it.  i have lived near the patuxent river naval air station my entire life, where they test aircraft, and i can identify planes and helicopters, as the fly over my house every day all day and night. i have never seen a craft like that before, so low and so quiet.  approximate location of where i stopped to see the craft above me 38°53'37.2"n 76°35'43.5"w
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft hovered, dropped 2-3 balls of light then flew away rapidly.

content.detailedDescription: July 1 2016 12:50am i walked outside and saw a flash .Like a camera flash out of the corner of my eye i turned to the star in which it come from and the star 5 seconds later slowly faded out and was gone .This is the third time i have seen this happen from the same area.....Maybe a star is going to die and is flashing
content.summary: Looked as if a star was ready to eexplode

content.detailedDescription:
1999 in san jose, costa rica, area called moravia, my close family & i experienced a local power outage at our house, as we went looking for each other we notice a humming sound (kind of like a generator) near the house but we knew our neghbors did not have a generator, as we look outside we notice other homes across the street have power and we also notice colorful lights reflecting from the sky off our roof-less patio area my mom peeked outside and told me and my brother to stay inside, she did not let us go to the patio so we went to another window where i could see the lights spinning above and changing colors (pink yellow blue green red) as it spun there was a thin cloud over the surface but the rotating lights were bright enough to shine through and reflect from the outdoor white wall and give visibility. the craft was not that high up in the sky and the thin cloud was close to our house, my mom soon came and took us away from the other window and as we walked inside the humming stopped and the power came back and the colorful lights went away. i have never forgotten that day and nor has my family. the next day the maid came to our house telling us that one of our neighbors that she worked for had spotted a ufo from her second floor towards our direction.

one other detail is that there were power lines connected to a transformer in front of our house.
content.summary: Power outage at home while ufo hovering above our house emitting colorful lights in a circular motion.

content.detailedDescription:
Rectory avenue, high wycombe, uk

2nd november 2014 16:00, daylight but overcast.
 
i was renting a room in a house on rectory avenue in high wycombe. the house was on the side of amersham hill. the room was at the front of the house on the first floor and had a large 5 pane single glazed bay window that overlooked the valley. from the window i could see nearby houses and rooftops, further away the green grass of the rye recreation ground, and in the distance tree tops that formed the other side of the valley. 

i was sitting on a double bed in my bedroom using a laptop. the bay window was to my right. i glanced up from the laptop and was surprised to see a formation of lights moving silently to my right in the furthest pane from me of the bay window. there was no noise that i could hear although the openers were shut but they were old and drafty. they were fairly close to me at this point (a few house away, for example) and reminded me of stars or yellow/white fairy lights like the kind that you see on christmas trees. i quickly put my laptop on the bed and went to the window to watch. there were approximately 12 to 14 of these lights and not only were they quickly moving to my right but they were also moving around close to each other. some moved down while others moved up while others moved around each other whilst still travelling to my right. as they did so, they formed a v shape similar to that of geese in flight - a v lying flat with the point leading like an arrow. they had also dropped in altitude to roughly the same as mine.  as they flew away from me across the valley each arm of the v undulated as though they were tethered by some invisible line. i definitely remember seeing the lights bobbing. at that point i quickly returned to the bed to fetch my phone so that i could take some photos. when i returned to the window they were far away and i decided not to take a photo as i had to unlock my phone and i did not want to miss anymore of the spectacle. i remember saying to myself that they looked like geese in flight. at this point, they were in a fixed formation with no bob or undulation.  up over the trees on the other side of the valley they went and up into the sky.  i continued to watch until they blended with the greyish white clouds and had flown out of sight. what i did not realise until posting this is that the former site of raf daws hill was in the vicinity that they flew over whilst i was watching. 

i imagine that some of you reading this will think that what i witnessed were chinese lanterns. i have seen chinese lanterns in flight many times both during the day and at night and in different conditions.  although what i witnessed was similar i saw no flickering of naked flames. in fact, i saw some chinese lanterns a few weeks ago one afternoon which reminded me of my sighting and i had the chance to compare. i knew that they were chinese lanterns immediately and although they were further away that what i witnessed i could see the flicker. what i witnessed seemed to be different, internally lit but no flicker, a constant radiance of light like a fairy light. plus they moved around each other and formed a flat v shape lead by the point. i have never seen chinese lanterns do this. some of you might argue that they were chinese lanterns tethered together but the question is why didn’t they tangle when they were moving around each other and how would you control the v to get it lying flat with the point leading? wouldn't the wind wind cause them to tangle?

i talked to people at work and the people i was living with but nobody else seemed to have seen what i witnessed. i also checked on-line to try and find other reports but so far have found nothing.
content.summary: Lights like stars seen flying low over high wycombe

content.detailedDescription: I was having dinner with ex girlfriend and my son by the hudson river in new jersey right across from new york city i observed a strange light in the sky and took a video of it from my cell phone
content.summary: I was having dinner with ex girlfriend and my son by the hudson river in new jersey right across from new york city i observed a strange light in the sky and took a video of it from my cell phone

content.detailedDescription: I need to verify this by checking with all you lillingtonians about three occasions in the past three months (march 17th, april 1st (don't even start), and june 9th) where i saw, how should i put this....Screw it...Ufo's over the 450 ft. cell tower on 421 north, the one you could hit with a rock standing in my parents back yard. here are the details, the first two occasions were the same craft or at least same type, it was chrome oblong shape (like the top of a mushroom, and no i wasn't on shrooms) and did not move an inch, it was sitting i would guess 100 feet left of the top of the tower(1st) and about 3 quarters the way up about 500 ft away (2nd). it was there one minute and gone the next. i observed each for about 1-2 minutes each time. the third was really high directly above the top of the tower, guessing several thousand feet, which means i could not make out the shape but, it did move, and mean it moved. nothing, and i mean nothing man made could move that fast and make turns like this thing did. it would turn the pilot into instant spam. anyway those are the details, no i didn't have my phone on me on any of these occasions, and the only thing in my system was advil and mountain dew.
content.summary: Hovering mushroom chrome craft by 450 ft. cell tower

content.detailedDescription: I know i have et living in m y trees all over and this will prove it ive told you before
content.summary: Was  outside taking pic saw bright gold light took pic it dissapeard took another pic again and their it was again but in dif form

content.detailedDescription: Object traveling at a high rate of speed from southwest sky passed over chillicothe, slowed rapidly, changed direction abruptly and headed northeast toward circlville.  object performed a series movements uncharacteristic to modern aircraft.
content.summary: Object traveling at a high rate of speed from southwest sky passed over chillicothe, slowed rapidly, changed direction abruptly and headed northeast toward circlville.  object performed a series movements uncharacteristic to modern aircraft.
